context: Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. is a video game publisher focused on Grand Theft Auto, NBA 2K, and other AAA game franchises. Gaming surge during pandemic. Sports titles strong.

competitors.name: Activision Blizzard
competitors.notes: Call of Duty Warzone success, before Microsoft acquisition

competitors.name: Electronic Arts
competitors.notes: $7.4B revenue FY2024, FIFA and Madden dominance

competitors.name: Tencent
competitors.notes: World's largest gaming company by revenue

competitors.name: Epic Games
competitors.notes: Fortnite success, Unreal Engine, Epic Games Store
